my_open_issues.name: My Open Issues
my_open_issues.jql: assignee = currentUser() AND status != Done ORDER BY priority DESC, created ASC

my_recent.name: My Recent Issues
my_recent.jql: assignee = currentUser() ORDER BY updated DESC

open_bugs.name: Open Bugs
open_bugs.jql: type = Bug AND status in (Open, 'In Progress') ORDER BY priority DESC

unassigned.name: Unassigned Issues
unassigned.jql: project = {PROJECT} AND assignee is EMPTY AND status != Done ORDER BY priority DESC

created_this_week.name: Created This Week
created_this_week.jql: project = {PROJECT} AND created >= startOfWeek() ORDER BY created DESC

updated_today.name: Updated Today
updated_today.jql: project = {PROJECT} AND updated >= startOfDay() ORDER BY updated DESC

overdue.name: Overdue Issues
overdue.jql: duedate < now() AND status != Done ORDER BY duedate ASC

high_priority_open.name: High Priority Open
high_priority_open.jql: priority in (Highest, High) AND status not in (Done, Closed) ORDER BY priority DESC

resolved_not_closed.name: Resolved But Not Closed
resolved_not_closed.jql: status = Resolved AND resolution is not EMPTY ORDER BY resolved DESC

watching.name: Issues I'm Watching
watching.jql: watcher = currentUser() ORDER BY updated DESC

recent_comments.name: Recently Commented
recent_comments.jql: project = {PROJECT} AND comment ~ currentUser() ORDER BY updated DESC

blocked.name: Blocked Issues
blocked.jql: labels = blocked OR status = Blocked ORDER BY priority DESC
